member.summary: Defines the pdf viewer control for displaying a pdf document source.

member.summary: Defines an abstract class for the viewer controls.

member.summary: Gets or sets the view mode.

member.summary: Occurs after the page index is changed.

member.summary: Occurs after the view mode is changed.

member.summary: Occurs after the zoom factor is changed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the service url. It works as "~/api/" when it is not set.

member.summary: Gets or sets the document path.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.OnClientQueryLoadingData
member.summary: Queries the request data sent to the service before loading the document.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether viewer is under full screen mode.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.OnClientFullScreenChanged
member.summary: Occurs after the full screen mode is changed.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.SelectMouseMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking and dragging with the mouse selects text. This property only works for desktop.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.OnClientSelectMouseModeChanged
member.summary: Occurs after the select mouse mode is changed.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.ZoomMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the current zoom mode to show the document pages.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ViewerBase.ThresholdWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold to switch between mobile and PC template

member.summary: Defines the report viewer control for displaying a report document source.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report name.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ReportViewer.Paginated
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content should be represented as set of fixed sized pages.
member.remarks: The default value is null, means using the default value from document source.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ZoomMode
member.summary: Describes the supported zoom modes of FlexViewer.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ZoomMode.Custom
member.summary: Custom zoom mode. The actual zoom factor is determined by the value of the @see:ZoomFactor property.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ZoomMode.PageWidth
member.summary: Pages are zoomed in or out as necessary to fit the page width in the view panel.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Viewer.ZoomMode.WholePage
member.summary: Pages are zoomed in or out as necessary to fit the whole page in the view panel.
